title: Duo Queue Ranked Questions!
body:
When I play Solo Ranked, I win a lot. And if I play nothing BUT solo Ranked for a while, my lp gains start rising. No clue why

I due queue with my best mate a lot though, and some days we'll go on a 3/0 winning streak, but most of the time, we lost majority of our games. I still play the sane role, same champions, I still play just as good. He also plays well most games, and if he's having a bad game, he doesn't feed. We even coordinate ganks, rotations and always keep objectives in mind. At the moment, I'm B1 he's B3

replies.body: When you duo in ranked, you MMR is artificially inflated (something about more communication) so you get matched up against higher skill opponents.
